items.sentence: Some of our members weren\'t at the meeting.
I ate some bread and a boiled egg for lunch.
I began studying French when I was thirteen.
I began to study French when I was thirteen.
I can see the castle from my bedroom window.
Tom asked me if I had already paid the bill.
Here\'s some money. Go buy yourself a drink.
I really don\'t think that\'ll be necessary.
I took a taxi from the station to the hotel.
I understood everything that you said to me.
I used to dream about becoming an astronaut.
We don\'t know what the future holds for us.
We don\'t know what they want to use it for.
We don\'t know whether Tom is dead or alive.
I was waiting for Tom to tell me what to do.
Tom told his friends that he never ate meat.
Tom told me he and Mary had gotten divorced.
Tom told me he had to go back to the office.
I wonder how much time we\'ve wasted so far.

I don\'t care what Tom says. I\'m not going.
Tom wasn\'t the one who asked me to do that.
Tom wasn\'t the only student who was absent.
Tom has something to discuss with all of us.

Tom was exactly where Mary said he would be.
